hero.subtitle: An International fan-translation group for Nintendo games.

about.title: What is Ninternational?
about.subtitle: You are a fan-translator working on a Nintendo game? Ninternational is a fan-translation repository all about Nintendo games from all platforms. You can submit your translation on our website, to get more visibility and help from a dedicated community. If you're interested, join our Discord!

footer.disclaimer: Ninternational is a fan-driven translation group for Nintendo games. It is not affiliated with Nintendo or any of its subsidiary.
